name: The First Day of The End!
name_original: The First Day of The End!
description:
You awaken to find yourself alone amongst a forest of crates and fallen (alien?) trees.

Fight your way through arrangements of evil invading robots to escape the planet!

This was made as a little experiment for me to learn SteamVR.

Thanks for playing!

The gameplay video only exported parts of my screen :(

Hopefully the screenshots can tell the tale to anyone who can't play.
